Method Detail

enableShutdownWithJVM

public void enableShutdownWithJVM()
Enables automatic shutdown when JVM shuts-down (gracefully). This is enabled by default. NOTE: The hooks to the JVM Shutdown don't work in case of "non-graceful" shutdown.

disableShutdownWithJVM

public void disableShutdownWithJVM()
Disables automatic shutdown when JVM shuts-down (gracefully).

isShutdownWithJVMEnabled

public boolean isShutdownWithJVMEnabled()
Is the automatic shutdown when JVM shuts-down enabled?

Returns:
Is the automatic shutdown when JVM shuts-down enabled?
